TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Claim extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示與實體關聯的宣告。

span.span: Represents a claim that is associated with an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身分識別模型為宣告架構的授權系統。The Identity Model is a claims-based authorization system. 宣告會描述與系統中某些實體關聯的功能，這類實體通常是指該系統的使用者。Claims describe the capabilities associated with some entity in the system, often a user of that system. 與特定實體關聯的一組宣告可以視為金鑰。The set of claims associated with a given entity can be thought of as a key. 這些特定宣告會定義該金鑰的形狀，就像是用來開啟門鎖的實體鑰匙。The particular claims define the shape of that key; much like a physical key is used to open a lock in a door. 如此一來，宣告就可用來取得資源的存取權。In this way, claims are used to gain access to resources. 判定特定受保護資源之存取權的方式，就是比較存取該資源時所需要的宣告以及與嘗試進行存取之實體關聯的宣告。Access to a given protected resource is determined by comparing the claims required to access that resource with the claims associated with the entity that attempts access. 宣告就是權限對於特定值的運算式。A claim is the expression of a right with respect to a particular value. 權限可以是讀取、寫入或擁有權限，A right could be read, write, or possess. 值可以是資料庫、檔案、信箱或屬性。A value could be a database, a file, a mailbox, or a property. 宣告也具有宣告類型，Claims also have a claim type. 宣告類型和權限共同提供的機制適用於使用值進行指定的各項功能。The combination of claim type and right provides the mechanism for capabilities being specified with respect to the value. 例如，如果 `file` 類型的宣告對 `read` 值擁有 `biography.doc` 權限，表示具有此類宣告的實體擁有 biography.doc 檔案的讀取權限。如果某個類型名稱的宣告對 值擁有 `Martin` 權限，表示具有該宣告的實體擁有值為 `Name` 的 `Martin` 屬性。For example, a claim of type `file` with the right `read` over the value `biography.doc` indicates that the entity with such a claim has read access to the file biography.doc. A claim of type name with the right over the value `Martin` indicates that the entity with the claim possesses a `Name` property with the value `Martin`. 雖然各種宣告類型和權限都是定義為身分識別模型的一部分，但是系統仍具備擴充性。Although various claim types and rights are defined as part of Identity Model, the system is extensible. 以身分識別模型基礎架構為基礎的各種系統可以視需要定義宣告類型和權限。The various systems building on top of the Identity Model infrastructure can define claim types and rights as required. ## Examples [!code-csharp[c_Claim#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_Claim#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以是其中一個由 類別之靜態屬性表示的預先定義宣告類型。The property can be one of the pre-defined claim types that are represented by the static properties of the class. 宣告類型會指定要經過判斷提示的宣告類型，例如電子郵件地址。Claim types specify the type of claim that is being asserted, such as an email address. ## Examples [!code-csharp[c_Claim#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c_Claim#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/vb/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultComparer As IEqualityComparer(Of Claim)

summary.span: 取得可以比較兩個 物件是否相等的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can compare two objects for equality.

value.span: 介面實作，可比較兩個 物件。

span.span: A interface implementation that compares two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性的值來比對任何預先定義的宣告類型。Use the value of the property to match any of the pre-defined claim types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 要與目前 比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with the current .

summary.span: 判斷指定的物件是否表示與目前 物件相同的宣告。

span.span: Determines whether the specified object represents the same claim as the current object.

returns.span: 如果 表示與目前 相同的宣告則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if represents the same claim as the current ; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫 方法，可比較 物件是否相同。This method overrides the method to provide equality comparisons for objects. 比較過程包含對 、 和 屬性的值進行三項比較，The comparison consists of three comparisons on the values of the , , and properties. 針對 屬性使用的比較演算法需視 屬性的值而定。The comparison algorithm that is used on the property depends upon the value of the property. 下表詳細列出指定之宣告類型所使用的比較演算法。The following table details the comparison algorithm that is used for the specified claim type. |宣告類型Claim type|邏輯比對Comparison| |----------------|----------------| ||針對資源且字串不區分大小寫的比較。Case insensitive string comparison on the resource.| ||以位元組逐一比較。Byte-by-byte comparison.| ||針對演算法的模數和指數部分進行位元組逐一比較。Byte-by-byte comparison on the Modulus and Exponent parts of the algorithm.| ||以位元組逐一比較。Byte-by-byte comparison.| ||SID 比較。SID comparison.| ||正規化的 X.500 未經處理資料比較。Normalized X.500 raw data comparison.|
